Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.data.Camera

extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the properties of a camera

    • Constructor Detail

      • Camera

        public Camera(float FOV,
              float ASPECT,
              float Z_NEAR,
              float Z_FAR)
        Creates a camera
        Parameters:
        FOV - - field of view
        ASPECT - - aspect ratio width / height
        Z_NEAR - - near clip plane
        Z_FAR - - far clip plane

        Parameters:
        transform - - Transformation to use

      • createMatricesUBO

        public void createMatricesUBO()
        Creates a UBO containing the camera's world, view and projection matrices.

      • updateMatricesUBO

        public void updateMatricesUBO(org.joml.Matrix4f worldMatrix)
        Updates the data in the UBO, created by createMatricesUBO().
        Parameters:
        worldMatrix - - world matrix of the camera. Must be taken from Transformation.getWorldMatrix() using the Transformation passed to updateViewMatrix(Transformation)
